titles.title: Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2001
To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to increase the nutritional assistance block grant for Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 11/5/2001--Introduced. Fair Nutrition for American Citizens Act of 2001 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 respecting food stamp block grants for the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico to: (1) consolidate funding for Puerto Rico and American Samoa; (2) extend funding, with increased FY 2002 amounts; (3) permit specified FY2002 expenditures for data system upgrades and eligibility system implementation; and (4) obligate funds for full annual payment of a specified nutrition assistance program in American Samoa.
